meanings.definition: To specialize to an excessive degree.
meanings.sent1: She overspecialized in one subject and neglected all others.
meanings.sent2: He overspecialized in computer programming and struggled with social skills.
meanings.sent3: The chef overspecialized in making soufflés and couldn't even boil an egg.
meanings.sent4: The athlete overspecialized in long-distance running, but lacked speed in sprints.
meanings.sent5: The artist overspecialized in abstract art, ignoring other forms of expression.

meanings.sent1: The overspecialized mechanic only knew how to fix one type of car.
meanings.sent2: She felt overspecialized in her field and wanted to broaden her skills.
meanings.sent3: The overspecialized tailor could only sew one type of clothing.
meanings.sent4: The overspecialized doctor focused solely on one rare disease.
meanings.sent5: The overspecialized scientist was a master in one narrow area of research.
